Bakery.Description: Choose from Building, Shed, or false. Building adds the bakery as a new custom building. Shed adds it as a shed upgrade for Market Town compatibility but it will NOT be compatible with other custom shed interiors. False disables the bakery entirely. Defaults to Building.

Brewery.Description: Choose from Building, Shed, or false. Building adds the Brewery as a new custom building. Shed adds it as a shed-type building for Market Town compatibility but it will NOT be compatible with other custom shed interiors. False disables the brewery entirely. Defaults to Building.

Conservatory.Description: Choose if you would like to enable the tea conservatory. True by default.

SlimeHutchRenovation.Description: Choose if you would like to change the slime hutch interior to one of our custom map interiors: bakery, brewery, restaurant, tea shop, or winery. Non-upgradable version of map only. False by default.
SlimeHutchRenovation.AllowValues: Bakery, Brewery, Restaurant, Tea Shop, Winery, false

InteriorStyle.Description: Choose if you would like the interior of the buildings to be pre-furnished with movable furniture or empty. Defaults to Furnished. NOTE: you must have the right furniture pack installed in order for the furniture to spawn in. See mod page for details.
